title: Design, synthesis and activity evaluation of arctigenin derivatives with HDAC inhibition activity
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,9314-9325
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA00050A, Paper

Xinyue Jiang, Yuchao Yan, Huali Yang, Maosheng Cheng, Deqiang Dou, Yang Liu
This study demonstrated that an arctigenin derivative B7 induced apoptosis in leukemia MV411 cells by enhancing histone acetylation levels and activating the Caspase-3 pathway.
